sentence.Network_en: Methods: Using Pharmacognostical method to observe and compare the characters of Cortex ailanthus and Cortex sinensis.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 按生药学常规方法对臭椿皮与香椿皮进行对比研究.

sentence.Network_en: CONCLUSION: Cortex toona and ailanthus are different in plant origins, antimicrobial effects and ingredients.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 香椿皮、臭椿皮来源于两种不同科属的植物, 抗菌效果不同,成分不同,不宜混用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from French ailante, from Amboinese ailanto, literally 'tree of heaven' (the ending being influenced by names ending with -anthus, from Greek anthos 'flower')

means.word_mean: 1. any of several deciduous Asian trees of the genus Ailanthus
